title: How long do i have to wait to get off leave buster for good
body: doing 5 x 10 minute waits atm, did 5 x 5 minute waits over a week ago whith heaps of games between. now how many games to time duration do i have to wait so my next penalty isnt the 5 x 20 minute waits. not arguing the point im just curious.

replies.body: It’s a bit hard to explain but I’ll try... say you leave enough to earn 5 min bans... after X amount of time it will reset to the point where you will get 5 min ban again but if you leave during that x amount of time it will become 10 min ban then the same thing will happen you have to wait x amount of time and it will go down to 5 min ban... but if you leave again in that time after the 10 min ban you might find yourself with a 20 min ban so you have to wait the duration of 20 then 10 then 5 which in my experience was around 10 months
